content: materials crochet hook 6 mm worsted weight yarn pink mint green yarn needle scissors it measures 25 cm long and 17 cm wide using similar yarn abbreviations chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet increase = increase 2 half_double_crochet in one st decrease = decrease half_double_crochet 2 together blo = back loop only st s = stitches slip_stitch = slip_stitch repeat = repeat * * = repeat work between asterisks as indicated = number of stitches you should have at the end of your round english version 1 1 https //yazminasscraft com/mermaid-tail-purse-crochet/
